EmailTemplate.name: Cloud Foundry Platform 2015Q1.CFP Cincinnati on 3-10-15
EmailTemplate.subject: Test Drive Pivotal Cloud Foundry Platform on March 10th in Cincinnati
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
CLOUD PLATFORM ROADSHOW TEST DRIVE CLOUD FOUNDRY PLATFORM Join the Pivotal Cloud Foundry team for a full day of in-depth, hands-on sessions where you will build and deploy software on a next generation cloud platform. In a matter of hours you will experience how easy it is to deploy and run an application on Pivotal Cloud Foundry.
Workshop At A Glance:
Keynote: Software is Eating the World Hear how software is transforming our world at an ever-increasing pace. In a world where real-time information drives decision making in organizations that are not traditional technology companies.
Hands-On Session: The Developer Experience You will learn how to push, bind and scale an application, all while monitoring the applicationâ€™s health and performance.
Hands-On Session: Architecture & Operations Explore the Pivotal Cloud Foundry architecture, as well as BOSH. You will learn how the platform works, as well as the operational visibility it can provide to your entire ecosystem.
Hands-On Lab: Enabling Continuous Delivery Walk through how the platform can enable continuous delivery, including how you can leverage CloudBees Jenkins for continuous integration. You will experience a hands-on lab that will show you how to build an application with Spring Boot.
Sign Up today!
REGISTER <https://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/cincinnati?utm_source=Meetup&utm_medium=meetup&utm_campaign=cloud-roadshow> TEST DRIVE CINCINNATI TUESDAY MARCH 10 8:00AM TO 4:00PM REGISTER <https://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/cincinnati?utm_source=Meetup&utm_medium=meetup&utm_campaign=cloud-roadshow>
